title: Authorize Wasm Upload: Discover Decentralization DAO
summary: To upload and manage the cw-infuer deployment, grant Discover Decentralization DAO upload permissions
details: Adds stars1x7krclfpvt3d50ae4cvukckz4fe46g5gx393y2cjtdpar3aw6r3q3g8pd0 to be able to upload wasm contracts, specifically for the purpose of maintaining cw-infuser deployment.
